civilians awareness and partnership with all the stakeholders we are able to eradicate the disease by 2030 the vaccine is cheaper one dose of vaccine is less than 10 cents to vaccinate one animal is countries small ruminant is the property of women therefore is really major issue if a man lost his 80 over 100 animals she will not be able to sell the animals and to have meat milk would litter and are able to eradicate the disease but to the cost the losses a year of this disease due to this disease has been estimated to be between 1.5 and 2 billion a year but if we invest 3 billion globally we eradicate the disease
